text.section: The Miami-Dade County Economic Development Committee, or its successor, shall provide its nominations to the Board of County Commissioners no later than six (6) months prior to the expiration of the term of the presently-serving Special Ambassador. The Board of County Commissioners shall appoint one (1) Special Ambassador per term, except that legal spouses may serve jointly as Special Ambassadors during a single term provided that both spouses independently meet the criteria to serve as Special Ambassadors.
